00075  int CTrackerFile::Init(IplImage *img,int **keys,CvMat **points){
00076      if (first==true){
00077          char fichero[200];
00078          sprintf(fichero,FORIGEN,frame);

00086          while (fscanf(f,"%d %d %d %d\n", &num, &y, &x, &dumb)!=EOF)
00087          {
00088             cout<<"x "<<x<<" y "<<y<<" id "<<num<<endl;

00090             cvmSet(*points,numptos,1,y) ;
00091             cvmSet(*points,numptos,2,1000) ;
00092             cvmSet(*points,numptos,3,0) ;
00093             numptos++;
00094          }
00095          first=false;
00096          return numptos;
00097      }else{
00098          return 0;
